meta.title: Home - Garrett County Public Schools - Garrett County Public Schools

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: The public schools in Garrett County were chartered to serve the public interest. That interest lies in the maintenance of an educated citizenry necessary for the survival of a free society.
The public schools in Garrett County were chartered to serve the public interest. That interest lies in the maintenance of an educated citizenry necessary for the survival of a free society.

div.a: School Messenger and PowerSchool Portal Setup

div.p:
All GCPS schools will be closed from March 16 through May 15, 2020.
The GCPS central office will be closed to the public until further notice. Anyone with a question or concern may contact public.info@garrettcountyschools.org, and you will receive a response.
There have been 4 confirmed cases of Coronavirus in Garrett County.
Please continue to check our website and the GCPS Coronavirus Updates page for more information.

img.alt: Photo depicting elementary student, middle and high school student and an administrative person.
img.div: An online experience built uniquely for you. Choose yours now.

a.title: Link selects middle and high school website experience.

img.alt: Garrett County Public Schools Coronavirus Updates. Click here. Stay informed!

p.style: color: white; text-align: center; background-color: #06acda; font-size: 25px; margin-top: 15px; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 15px; line-height: 30px

div.p: The GCPS Continuity of Learning Plan (COLP) has been consolidated into this LiveBinder for the 2020 school closures due to the Covid-19 pandemic.

p.a: Reminder - Elementary Packet Pickup is Scheduled for Friday, April 24, 2020

div.p: Elementary school grade level learning packet #2 for students in grades Pre-K through 5 will be available at your home school on Friday, April 24, 2020.

p.a: GCPS Provides WiFi Connectivity from School Parking Lots

div.p: Garrett County Public Schools is providing an internet connection that is accessible from your vehicle in parking lots at all schools.

p.a: Superintendent Baker Announces 2020-21 GCPS Teacher of the Year

div.p: Barbara Baker, Superintendent of Garrett County Public Schools, announces the GCPS 2020-21 Teacher of the Year.

p.a: Free and Reduced Meal Applications are Accepted Anytime

div.p: Applications for free and reduced meals are accepted at any time throughout the school year.

a.title: Opens Garrett County Public Schools Facebook page
Opens Garrett County Public Schools Twitter page

div.div:
Garrett County Public Schools (GCPS) is committed to providing a website that is accessible to individuals with disabilities in compliance with the requirements of Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.
Contact Information
GCPS continues to improve the accessibility of this site as new technology and opportunities emerge. We welcome your questions and suggestions to guide our efforts. If you experience any difficulty in accessing a GCPS website due to a disability, or for any reason, you may file a complaint.
For information of how to file a Section 504 complaint, please see Policy/Procedure ACEA.
